About us — Building human‑AI collaboration

We help companies achieve efficiency in their operational business processes with tailored GenAI solutions. Our approach focuses on integrating Generative AI across operations to lead the digital era. Our AI systems seamlessly optimize processes and decision‑making, enhancing your organization’s capabilities across multiple areas.

How we deliver business value with GenAI

8.text: We are at the forefront of the Generative AI revolution, delivering cutting-edge solutions that transform businesses across industries. Our services turn AI into a competitive advantage by accelerating innovation, improving efficiency, and creating differentiated customer experiences. If you’re ready to explore how AI can change your business, let’s talk.

9.text:
How AI helps your business
- Process optimization: AI automates processes to reduce operational time and costs, freeing your team to focus on strategic and creative work that adds more value to the company.
- Advanced personalization: AI delivers highly personalized experiences by tailoring products and services to individual preferences and behaviors, boosting customer satisfaction and brand loyalty.

10.text:
- Enhanced decision making: AI analyzes large volumes of data in real time to provide accurate insights, enabling faster, more informed decisions and improving the effectiveness of your strategy.
- Continuous innovation: Embedding AI in your solutions unlocks new capabilities and business opportunities, keeping you competitive in an evolving market.

24.text:
Case Studies and Clients

We build generative AI–driven, tailored solutions that help companies boost their KPIs. Below are selected case studies showing how our work improves customer service, operational efficiency, and data governance across industries.

Transform Your Business with Generative AI

25.text: AI Revolution in Healthcare: Transforming Call Centers for Blue Cross Blue Shield

26.text: Blue Cross Blue Shield (BCBS), a leading U.S. health insurance provider with more than 150,000 employees nationwide, faced significant call center inefficiencies. Agents struggled to navigate thousands of complex medical contracts and documents, which led to lengthy response times, delayed consultations, high turnover, and frustrated customers. A scalable, efficient solution was required to streamline operations in this document-heavy environment.

27.text: We developed a cutting-edge AI system that leverages generative AI, vector databases, and LangChain to process complex medical inquiries. The solution provides accurate, context-aware responses at high speed, handling complex inquiries in under 40 seconds.

28.text: The implementation produced dramatic results: average response times fell by 90%, dropping from roughly 10 minutes to about 30–60 seconds. Agent efficiency increased, enabling staff to handle many more inquiries per shift, and error rates declined thanks to more precise information retrieval and comprehension.

29.text:
AI-Powered Forestry Automation: Enhancing Operations for FAS
FAS is a service company operating in the forestry sector, focused on commercial activity, logistics, and forestry production. They needed to simplify key operational processes such as truck tracking and digitizing delivery notes, improve the accuracy of manual data entry through AI, and provide their team with No Code tool training so they could manage automations themselves.

30.text:
Our approach combined internal team training on automation tools with the development and deployment of practical automations. Delivered automations included:
- Truck tracking automation
- Non-digital delivery note automation
- Harvest data automation
- Document management automation

31.text: The project significantly improved the efficiency of manual tasks, reducing both time spent and error rates. The AI-powered delivery note automation was especially effective in digitizing a previously manual process. As the client summarized, “The new automations have allowed us to manage our operations more efficiently and with better structure.”

32.text:
Empowering Innovation: AI-Driven Automation and Data Governance for Handy
Handy is a Uruguayan fintech founded in 2021 that provides payment solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. By simplifying payment collection, Handy enables merchants to focus on growth. The company is expected to surpass 30,000 clients by the end of the year and is becoming a key player in Uruguay’s electronic payment ecosystem.

33.text: We partnered with Handy to deliver training on generative AI, implement AI-driven automation, and lead a data governance project. Work included executive workshops for the director team to align leadership with generative AI technologies, hands-on and one-on-one training for operational teams to support automation rollout, and automating multiple processes across different areas. We also managed end-to-end data governance—from ideation to implementation—including migrating all user accounts to

34.text: end-to-end data governance—from ideation to implementation—including migrating all user accounts to a Microsoft-based system.

35.text: Results were strong: manual tasks became significantly more efficient, saving time and reducing errors. The data governance implementation was seamless and received overwhelmingly positive feedback. The client now operates with a more intelligent, efficient, organized, and secure system.

37.text: “Companies like Promptior offer an agile approach to incorporating Artificial Intelligence. Due to their still-small structure, they can move quickly and are constantly pushing the boundaries of the technological state of the art. They provide short cycles of trial and error, allowing them to leverage technology to achieve innovative solutions to real and profound problems in a short amount of time. This type of company brings a new, more agile, and less structured way of working, which can be

38.text: This type of company brings a new, more agile, and less structured way of working, which can be just as effective as that of more established companies.” — Marcel Jankelevich, Channel Sales Azure

40.text:
Cookie notice
This site uses cookies to give you the best possible experience. Promtior and our selected partners use cookies and similar technologies (collectively, “cookies”) that are necessary to display this website and deliver the best possible experience on it. Strictly necessary cookies are always used when you visit the site; they are essential for the site to function correctly. Teamtailor is listed as a provider for strictly necessary cookies.

41.text: If you give your consent, we will also use cookies for analytics to help us understand how the site is used. Teamtailor is listed as a provider for analytics cookies. You can read more about the cookies we use and how we use your data in our cookie policy. You may withdraw or manage your consent at any time by clicking “Manage cookies” at the bottom of any page.

Careers — building a career by creating the future
Generative AI is redefining entire professions, and at Promtior a career grows where the new is created. Our people work on innovative products, participate in strategic decisions, and benefit from mentorship and teams that raise the bar on every project.

44.text: At Promtior, culture is not a slogan or a decorative section — it is the space where trust, creativity and the ability to take on ambitious challenges are born. The team is sustained by genuine connections, constant exchange and a way of working that combines wellbeing, learning and shared responsibility. People find support, community and an environment that nurtures both professional development and personal balance. Innovation comes from that climate: from feeling part of something,

57.text:
Legal Notice

This Legal Notice governs access to, navigation of, and use of the Promtior website (the "Company"). By accessing this site you agree to the terms and conditions set forth here. The Company reserves the right to modify the presentation, configuration, and content of the website, as well as the conditions required for access and/or use, at any time and without prior notice.

58.text: The content on this website — including text, images, graphics, and source code — is the exclusive property of the Company or of third parties who have authorized its use. Any reproduction, distribution, or modification, whether in whole or in part, without prior written authorization from the Company is strictly prohibited.

59.text:
The Company does not guarantee the availability or continuity of the website’s operation, nor the absence of errors in its content. Nevertheless, we are committed to taking all necessary actions to correct any identified errors.

Privacy Policy: Principles

At Promtior we respect and protect the privacy of our users and clients. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information you provide when using our website.

60.text:
Information collection
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide through contact forms, subscriptions, and other direct communication channels. This information may include, but is not limited to, your name, email address, phone number, and any other details you choose to share.

61.text:
Use of information
The information we collect is used solely for the purposes specified at the time of collection, such as responding to your inquiries, improving our services, and keeping you informed about our activities. We do not share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to comply with a legal obligation or to protect our rights.

62.text:
Information protection
We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect the personal information you provide. However, please be aware that transmission of information over the Internet is not completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.

63.text:
User rights
You have the right to access, rectify, delete, or object to the processing of your personal data at any time. To exercise these rights, submit a request through the contact methods provided on our website. We are committed to respecting these rights and facilitating their exercise.

64.text:
Changes to the Privacy Policy
Promtior reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of our services after such changes have been implemented will constitute your acceptance of the new terms.

Contact
If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us through the contact form on our website.

65.text:
About Promtior
In November 2022, ChatGPT was released, causing a significant impact and challenging previously unquestionable principles: Creativity is an exclusively human trait.

The speed of these technological advancements has put unprecedented pressure on leaders to incorporate AI into their businesses.

66.text:
In May 2023, Promtior was founded facing this context, where the key question is: how to approach a scenario of transversal disruption and maximize the opportunities it presents?
Through its technological and organizational consulting, Promtior offers a way to generate new business models, answering this question and bringing companies at the forefront of their sector.

67.text:
Organizations that started their transition towards a Bionic future, with the help of Promtior: Paigo, Handy, SIEE, Guyer & Regules, Infocorp, ST Consultores, CIEMSA, 5M Travel Group, Forestal Atlántico Sur, Advice Consulting, CAF, L'Oreal Latam, Vangwe, RPA Maker, S1, Incapital

At Promtior, we specialize in implementing cutting-edge generative solutions, with a focus on the implementation of the RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architecture to meet the diverse needs of our clients.
